🌐 Module 4: Network Security

This module is titled Network Security, it is part of the University of Essex, Post Graduate Computer Science Degree.

👽 Table of Contents

  • 👉Assignment 1: Vulnerability Audit and Assessment - Baseline Analysis and Plan
  • 👉Assignment 2: Vulnerability Audit and Assessment - Results and Executive Summary
  • 👉Assignment 3: Individual Reflective Piece
  • Unit Assignments:
    • 🟢Unit 1: History of Network Security, Vulnerabilities, and Approaches
    • 🟡Unit 2: Advanced Persistent Threats: Applying the Cyber Kill Chain Model to a Case Study
    • 🟢Unit 3: Vulnerability Assessments
    • 🔴Unit 4: Breach Analysis and Mitigation
    • 🔴Unit 5: Logging, Forensics, and Future Trends
    • 🔴Unit 6: The Great Debate: The Future of the Internet
